column6: X-23's true origin continues. X-23 has committed hundreds of assassinations, but now the one person who swore they would never treat X-23 like a weapon will send her on a personal mission.  All the answers are here as events race to a dizzying close.
column8: | colorist:Brian Haberlin | writer:Craig Kyle | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Jonathan Sibal | penciller:Billy Tan
